comments:
Build ID: WTP1.5.4

Steps To Reproduce:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.validation 4 0 2007-06-11 15:43:14.868
!MESSAGE
*** ERROR ***: Mon Jun 11 15:43:14 CDT 2007    
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:
64)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorIm
pl.java:43)

        at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.WorkbenchContext.loadModel(
WorkbenchContext.java:585)
        at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.WorkbenchContext.loadModel(
WorkbenchContext.java:567)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.model.internal.validation.EarValidator.validateInJob(
EarValidator.java:140)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.validation.UIEarValidator.validateInJob(UIEa
rValidator.java:218)
        at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJ
ob.java:70)

When doing app publishing on an adopter, the EAR validation fails that causes the app publish to fail with the stacktrace above.

This is high severity problem on an adopter so I am marking this defect as hot_request.

More information:
Also, this seems to be regression problem since the same scenario can be run successfully before.
Verified with Robert Taniwa that this problem is not seen anymore in the latest builds.
